mapper.select: select A.orderid, A.orderdate, A.userid, A.userids, A.commid, A.ordertotal, A.orderstate, B.username, C.commname from commorder A,userinfo B,commodity C where A.userid = B.userid and A.commid = C.commid and A.userid = #{userid} and orderstate = #{orderstate}

select A.orderid, A.orderdate, A.userid, A.userids, A.commid, A.ordertotal, A.orderstate, B.commname from commorder A, commodity B where A.userids = #{userid} and orderstate != '在售中' and A.commid = B.commid and orderstate = #{orderstate}
mapper.update: update commorder set orderstate = #{orderstate} , orderdate = #{orderdate} where orderid = #{orderid}
mapper.insert: insert into commorder(orderid, orderdate, userid, userids, commid, ordertotal, orderstate) values (#{orderid},#{orderdate},#{userid},#{userids},#{commid},#{ordertotal},#{orderstate})
